shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Select text and press this key to execute translation
shortcuts.validation_error: Invalid shortcut key format. Please use format like 'Cmd+;' or 'Ctrl+;'
shortcuts.available_keys_html:
Available key notations (examples)
  • Modifier keys: Ctrl, Alt, Shift, Meta (Cmd)
  • Special keys: Enter, Space (Spacebar), Tab, Esc, Backspace, Delete, Home, End, PageUp, PageDown, ↑ ↓ ← →
  • Function keys: F1–F12
  • Symbol keys: ';', ',', '.', '/', \\ , '[', ']', '-', '=' etc. (use characters as-is)
Notation rules
  • Join modifier keys with + (e.g. Ctrl+Shift+S, Cmd+;)
  • Use Space or Spacebar for the space key
  • Write symbols as-is; add parentheses if needed
